component.name: ThemedBusySpinner
component.script:
Sub Init()
print "ThemedBusySpinner:Init"
m.top.poster.uri = "pkg:/images/spinner.png" m.global.observeFieldScoped("theme", "OnThemeChanged")
End Sub
Sub OnThemeChanged()
print "ThemedBusySpinner:OnThemeChanged"
m.top.poster.blendColor = m.global.theme.primary
End Sub
